The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an abandoned missle silo with bodies all over and an artificial intelligence that is running amok. So its up to the miner to find the source of the AI and put a halt to it.

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is going to be criticized by some because it has very little action in the first half, and ultimately for one and a half hours one might be asking themselves where the action was. Kathie Pearden, the director of the film, does present the viewers with two entertaining twists early on
